title: SPME: A marketing habit for solopreneurs who have other things to do besides marketing
description140: The SPME habit is a strategy, positioning and messaging framework that will help you craft successful messages that will lead your audience to buy your product.
description300: The SPME habit is a strategy, positioning and messaging framework that will help you craft successful messages that will lead your audience to buy your product.
author: Matthias Bohlen
